articles.title: LIVE: How to watch Rays vs. White Sox FREE on Apple TV+ - MLB.com
articles.description:
Friday night’s game between the Rays and White Sox -- as the league celebrates Jackie Robinson Day -- will air exclusively on Apple TV+. It will not be available on your local cable provider or MLB.TV.
